topLevelTasks.description: Analyze the overall task to understand its requirements and break it down into smaller components.
topLevelTasks.successCriteria: A clear understanding of the task's objectives and components, ready for further breakdown.

topLevelTasks.description: Identify up to five key subtasks needed to complete the overall task.
topLevelTasks.successCriteria: A list of up to five clearly defined subtasks is created, each with a specific goal that contributes to completing the overall task.

topLevelTasks.description: For each subtask, define what needs to be done in detail.
topLevelTasks.successCriteria: Each subtask has a detailed description explaining its purpose and how it contributes to the overall task.

topLevelTasks.description: List any terminal commands that need to be run for each subtask.
topLevelTasks.successCriteria: Each subtask has a list of necessary terminal commands provided, if applicable, to execute the task.

topLevelTasks.description: Define success criteria for each subtask to ensure completion can be verified.
topLevelTasks.successCriteria: Each subtask includes clear success criteria that allow verification of its completion.
